item.title: Art Garfunkel - Mary Was An Only Child
item.description:
Mary was an only child
nobody held her
Nobody smiled
she was born
In a trailer wretched
and poor
And she shone
like a gem
In a five and
dime store-

Mary had no friends
at all
Just famous faces
pinned to the wall
All of them
watched her
None of them saw
that she shone
Like a gem in a five
and dime store-

And if you watch
the stars at night
And find them shining
equally bright
You might have seen
jesus and not have
Known what you saw
who would notice
A gem in a five and
dime store-
